file_content.text: Good luck.
Done! It's done! Let's get out of here!
Move, move, move!
Let's go!
Let's get out of here!
I'm on the safe list? Everything is solid?
Are you sure?
Yes, everything's solid. Now let's go!
Keep up or you're dead! Go, go!
Shut up and run!
Okay, okay!
All right... all right... I can make it. I can make it from here. Whew!
Thank you. Thanks for covering me. You really are the best.
No problem.
I'm glad to have that over with.
That was a tough run.
Yeah. Me too.
We'd have been out of there a lot sooner if you hadn't wasted so much time.
Spare me the thanks.
I had to cover our tracks and make sure the changes to the safe list wouldn't be discovered too soon.
You'd better head for Club Vertica, up in the Promenade. I'll let Jonas know everything went okay. And after that, I'm taking a week off.
I'll see you around. Good luck.
I'm going as fast as I can!
Okay. Okay... okay!
There! That should do it. That should do nicely.
Are we ready to move out?
All done?
What? Oh, no, sorry.
You got me on that safe list pretty fast, Niall.
Good job.
It's about time you finished up!
Finally!
Huh? Oh, no. I'm not finished.
That was just the fund transfer. I moved some credits around so it would look like someone skimmed the casino's accounts, so no one would check the safe list.
Sir! More hostiles incoming!
We got a lot more trouble coming in, boss!
I'm adding you to the safe list now... just a little longer....
Havoc Squad! Suppressive fire!
Keep your head down, Niall!
Yes, sir!
You got it!
Just keep your head down and keep working, Niall.
I'll try to keep you covered.
You're kidding me.
If you don't get this done now, I'll shoot you myself, Niall!
Move it, maggot!
Kill them! Kill them all, now!
This would go a lot faster if I wasn't stuck using my portable equipment.
Okay, okay, let's see here. Good... good... okay, perfect.
The primary access protocol is bypassed. Now we just need to start with some priority data changes to cover our real moves....
Does that mean things are going well?
Um... good?
Sorry? Oh, yes. They're using the old 15-Rs, so this shouldn't take long.
We can't stay long, Niall. Finish as quickly as you can.
Let's make this fast.
Huh? Yes, yes, I'm going as fast as I can. Don't worry.
I'm making a few system changes before I add you to the safe list, which should keep their technicians distracted from what we're really doing.
I need to stay focused here, Niall. Don't distract me.
Shut up.
What? Oh. Sorry. No problem.
Hmm... daily income reports, year-by-year earning estimates, VIP profiles....
Sir! Incoming hostiles!
Hostiles coming in, Lieutenant!
There they are! Take 'em down!
Just keep me covered and I'll take care of everything for you.
I'm still with you! Let's go!
